price: at samakatuwid talaga sanang nagbigay Kami sa kanila mula sa nasa Amin na isang pabuyang dakila,
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
